events.message: The candidate submitted an application for the Software Engineer position with detailed information about their experience and skills.
Application was reviewed and categorized under the Engineering cluster based on keywords like software engineer and developer.
A recruiter with technical background was assigned to manage the candidate’s recruitment process for the engineering role.
Initial phone screening completed successfully, covering candidate's software engineering skills and project experience.
Candidate responded promptly, expressing enthusiasm for the role and availability for the next interview stage.
Technical interview was scheduled with the candidate, focusing on coding challenges and software development best practices.
Candidate successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong problem-solving skills and coding proficiency.
HR interview was scheduled to discuss company culture, benefits, and candidate’s long-term career goals.
HR interview completed positively with clear alignment on expectations and company values.
An offer was proposed including a competitive salary, benefits package, and a flexible work schedule.
Candidate provided positive feedback regarding the offer and expressed excitement about joining the engineering team.
Offer officially accepted by the candidate, confirming their commitment to join the company as a software engineer.
Onboarding process has started smoothly, including orientation, access setup, and introductions to key team members.
The recruitment case for the software engineer role was successfully closed with the candidate fully onboarded.
